name: Britetechs Companion
author: Britetechs

sections.description:
This plugin is developed for britetechs themes. This plugin creates the additional sections on the homepage in britetechs themes.
Britetechs Companion is a plugin creation to enhance the functionality of WordPress theme created by britetechs.

Features

Homepage Slider Section
Homepage Info Section
Homepage Service Section
Homepage Call To Action Section
Homepage Testimonial Section
and other section in the homepage.

License

Britetechs Companion WordPress plugin, Copyright (C) 2018 Britetechs
Britetechs Companion WordPress plugin is licensed under the GPL3 (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html).
